name: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Mythic Adventures © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like mass cure light wounds, except that it cures 4d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +40).
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘群体治疗轻伤 (cure light wounds, mass)’一般，不过它能治疗 {4d8+CL (最高+40)} 点伤害。
